entry.title: I desire violently, and I wait
entry.summary:
Author: shona22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,825Chapters: 2/4Kudos: 171

Summary: “Because, Stiles.” He hesitated, testing the words on his tongue before finally speaking. “You’re a kid. You don’t know what you want.”That particular ugly expression – of something hurt, displeased– flashes across the boy's features again. “And you chose this child, so–”“Give me a break,” Derek snapped, standing abruptly. “You think I chose this? You think I had a say in what my wolf did? You think I would ever choose a child? Choose you?”__Derek carried a secret - his wolf had claimed Stiles long ago, a truth hidden in the ravines of his sick mind. He refused to act on that wild instinct - wouldn't, couldn't. Now, that carefully guarded choice has begun to unravel, bleeding into sharp words and bruising touches; too much, yet never enough. He wonders if he has always been the very monster the hunters whispered about.

entry.title: No Graves for the Forgotten
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 79,881Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 60

Summary: He’s the face behind the throne.The ghost of a golden palace.The man married to the monster who destroyed everything.Stiles Stilinski has learned how to disappear in plain sight — with soft lips, dangerous eyes, and a body trained to please, not to feel.Derek Hale should hate him.But everything about Stiles is a provocation: the low voice, the crooked smile, the whispered secrets in the shadows of rebellion.They meet by accident.Then, by necessity.Soon, by desire.But Stiles carries secrets that could bring empires down — and an emptiness only Derek seems to see.In a world where love is a weapon and loyalty is a convenient lie, some sparks don’t fade.They burn everything in their path.

entry.title: after all this time, I still wonder
entry.summary:
Author: wishingonalightningbolt

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,191Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 20

Summary: It didn’t feel wrong when it was happening. Actually, it felt like the rightest thing in the fucking world. Despite the fact that they were sneaking around, that Derek never saw his place, that Derek had to lie to everyone in his life about what was making him so goddamn happy—it was the greatest relationship of his life.And then it went up in flames.-0-Derek and Stiles run into each other back in San Francisco, after five years apart.A ballet AU featuring danseur Derek and conductor Stiles, based off of a dynamic in the new Prime show "Étoile."

He’s had the intrusive thoughts before, but never acted on them, knowing better and deciding his marriage wasn’t worth risking. But now that Claudia is gone, and Stiles looks so much like her, he can no longer resist the temptation. entry.title: Like You Meant It
entry.summary:
Author: Hathly

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,638Chapters: 1/15Kudos: 27

Summary: “Normal people don’t pin someone against a chair, whisper in their ear, then go suck face with someone else and offer to drive them home like it’s some kind of civic duty.”Derek’s jaw flexes.“You’re mad.”“No shit, I’m mad!”They’re at a stoplight now, and Stiles turns to face him fully, chest tight.“You can’t just keep doing this. Showing up. Leaving. Touching me and then pretending it didn’t happen. I’m not—” He breaks off.Derek watches him. Silent.“I’m not like you,” Stiles says quietly.Derek’s voice, when it comes, is low. “I know" OR the one where I accidentally posted this -while editing, so HYG

entry.title: This Is Not Me Falling for You (Except It Definitely Is)
entry.summary:
Author: Hathly

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,098Chapters: 8/23Kudos: 168

Summary: “HALE! THIS ISN’T A MODELING GIG, STOP POSING AND THROW THE DAMN BALL!”And for just a second, Derek falters.Not visibly. Not enough for anyone else to notice. But Stiles sees it—the tiny twitch in his shoulder, the flick of his eyes toward the stands. He felt that. He heard him.Stiles grins, high on adrenaline and something he refuses to name.This? This is their thing. This is fine.And any other fluttery, ridiculous thought trying to take root in his chest?He shuts the door on it.Hard.Because he doesn’t like Derek.He can’t.It would be stupid. And dangerous. And asking for disaster.

entry.title: Totally S.U.P.E.S.!
entry.summary:
Author: Stout

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,975Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 15

Summary: Stiles Stilinski might look like nothing more than a mild-mannered engineering school drop-out. That's the story he tells prospective dates. But in reality, Stiles is the handler for a trio of kick-ass co-eds who happen to world-traveling super secret spies working for S.U.P.E.S., the Secret Undercover Something Something Syndicate.(Or something. They'd told Stiles what it stood for once at orientation and it'd flown right out of his head.)Fine-tuning gadgets, planning field missions, researching villains, and giving out the occasional piece of romantic advice - working for S.U.P.E.S. is a total dream job. Or at least it was, right up until the moment Stiles found himself forced to partner up with Derek Hale - his least favorite fellow agent and the hottest person Stiles has ever met. Hale's always had it out for Stiles.And he's also the boss' son.. . . Maybe it's time for Stiles to start sending out super secret resumes.

entry.title: All The Dead Dears
entry.summary:
Author: TwoSistersOfPersephone

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,197Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 33

Summary: It ends with a flash of white, bright light.Fucking witches. They’re the worst.It all goes to hell when Stiles slams his bat into the witch manning the altar mid-spell, feeling the coven’s collective attention turn to him, blackened eyes glittering with intent.And now?Well.The witches are gone. The Nemeton is safe.And he’s a fucking vampire, stuck with the one werewolf with the healing power to be Stiles’ personal Happy Meal (while he navigates this hopefully temporary situation). Who can teach him control. Who doesn’t live with a single human.Derek, with his steady and strong heartbeat that sounds like music to Stiles’ supernaturally enhanced ears. Derek, who’s giving him a soft, reassuring tilt of his lips, and maybe “insides turning to goo” is an as yet undiscovered part of vampirism? Derek, who’s been the star of every one of his wet dreams since he realized that petite, strawberry-blonde was no longer his type. Derek, who has let Stiles into his life more as adults than Stiles had ever dreamed of when they’d been young. Derek, who he’s slowly been falling for, if he’s honest with himself, since “this is private property.”Derek.He’s so fucked.

entry.title: DOUBLESPEAK & SUBTERFUGE
entry.summary:
Author: knox_rivers

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,500Chapters: 6/18Kudos: 22

Summary: After a series of events are erased from public memory, Stiles returns to Beacon Hills Prep with a fractured reputation and a growing power. Meanwhile Scott is having trouble reconciling the pressure and expectations from his estranged fathers–Rafael–sudden return.As the school restructures and supernatural tensions rise, old alliances are tested, new leaders emerge, and hidden agendas begin to surface. With friendships strained and the political balance shifting, Stiles and Scott are drawn deeper into a world of rituals, legacy, and dangerous expectations. Stiles also begins training under a reluctant mentor when he uncovers truths about the past and his role in a future that others are quietly trying to shape.Meanwhile, forces inside and outside the school maneuver to gain control, and the line between protector and pawn begins to blur. When violence erupts and loyalties are tested, Stiles must decide who he is, who he stands with, and what he’s willing to become to survive what’s coming next.Some power is inherited. Some is stolen. But the most dangerous kind? The uncontrollable.
